name: Mohamed Saad
summary: A recent graduate of Data Science, my ambition is to join a professional work environment that enables me to develop my scientific and practical skills to contribute to the development of the workplace in which I will work, and to be an effective and productive member to serve my community, advance my country, and contribute to improving and developing work to achieve the goals of the Kingdom s Vision 2030.

AI and Machine Learning for Data Analysis
projects: Graduation Project: Prediction of diabetes. Diabetes represents a major public health challenge and Machine learning techniques provide a promising way to predict diabetes risk based on patient characteristics and various biomarkers and in this project we used Pima Indians data and some libraries like Pandas, Numpy, Seaborn, Matplotlib to deal with these problems and we use some Model like Logistic Regression, SVC, Random Forest Classifier, Train and test Data, Confusion matrix the study contributes to the advancement of predictive analytics in diabetes management and prevention 2030.
